footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, providing you with clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
authRequiredDescription: You must be logged in to reserve a spot. Please sign in to continue.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, benefits, and the sacred process of Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced spiritual guides who will accompany you on your journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Find all the necessary information to prepare for your ceremony.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay connected with our community and be the first to know about our upcoming events and ceremonies.
whatIsAyahuascaTitle: A Sacred Brew from the Amazon
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a powerful ancestral brew used for millennia by indigenous peoples of the Amazon for healing and spiritual connection. It is prepared by combining two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of Chacruna (Psychotria viridis), which contains the psychoactive compound DMT.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The experience with Ayahuasca, often called 'la purga' due to its cleansing effects, induces a modified state of consciousness that allows for deep introspection, emotional release, and spiritual revelations. It is a tool for healing trauma, dissolving emotional blocks, and expanding consciousness.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a 'master plant' that teaches and guides. Each ceremony is a unique and personal dialogue with one's own inner self and the universe, facilitated by the spirit of the plant.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many participants report a significant reduction in mental 'noise,' achieving a state of peace and clarity that helps them understand their life purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Ayahuasca provides a safe space to confront and release deep-rooted traumas, repressed emotions, and self-destructive patterns, leading to profound emotional liberation.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: The experience fosters a deep sense of connection with oneself, others, nature, and the universe, revealing the underlying unity of all existence.
groupCeremonyDescription: Participate in a shared space where collective energy enhances the healing experience, fostering a sense of community and mutual support.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, ideal for those seeking to work on specific aspects in a more focused and contained environment, with the full attention of the guides.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the experienced spiritual guides who will accompany you with care and respect on your path of transformation.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore all our upcoming and past events. Each one is a unique opportunity for healing and discovery.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Follow these steps to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony. A good preparation is key to a profound and transformative experience.
preparationProcessDescription: From preparation to integration, each step is crucial. We will guide you through the entire process to ensure a safe and meaningful experience.
ceremonyProcessDescription: During the ceremony, you will be guided by our experts in a safe and respectful space, allowing the medicine to work its healing.
experienceProcessDescription: Each experience is unique. You may have visions, emotional releases, or deep realizations. Trust the process and allow yourself to flow.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we will help you understand and incorporate the teachings received into your daily life, ensuring lasting transformation.
dietSubtitle: A clean diet before the ceremony is essential to purify the body and allow the medicine to work more effectively. We recommend following it for at least 3-7 days prior.
allowedFoodsList: Fresh fruits and vegetables. Whole grains (rice, quinoa, oats). Legumes (lentils, chickpeas). White meats (chicken, fish) in moderation. Water and herbal teas.
prohibitedFoodsList: Red meat and pork. Fermented foods (aged cheese, soy sauce). Fried or processed foods. Sugar and sweets. Caffeine and alcohol. Spicy and overly seasoned foods.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your intention and mental state are fundamental to the experience. We recommend these practices to arrive with an open and receptive heart.
meditationDescription: Daily meditation helps calm the mind, reduce anxiety, and connect with your inner self before the ceremony.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you wish to heal or understand. A clear intention acts as a guide during the experience.
reflectionDescription: Writing down your thoughts and emotions before and after the ceremony is a powerful tool for integration.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony is an opportunity to confront and release deep emotions. It is a process of purification that can be intense but is profoundly liberating. Our team will be there to support you at all times, creating a safe and loving environment for your healing.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
comfortItemsList: Comfortable, light-colored clothing (preferably white). A blanket and pillow for your comfort. A bottle of water.
essentialsList: A notebook and pen to jot down your reflections. An open heart and a willingness to heal.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.

googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with your Google account.
registerSubtext: Join our community to begin your healing journey.

exportDataDescription: Download a JSON file with all your Firestore data.
importDataDescription: Import data from a previously exported JSON file. This will overwrite existing data.
importWarningDescription: This action will overwrite your current data with the contents of the selected file. A backup of the current state will be automatically created.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before the last import. You can restore it if something went wrong.
rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to restore the data from before the last import? This will overwrite the current data.
rollbackSuccessDescription: Data has been restored to the previous state.
